name: Airborn - Cosmic Rebels
description:
Single player action packed adventure, featuring:

  • 4 story missions
  • 12 Levels
  • Bonus levels
  • Giant boss fights
  • Unlockable new ships
  • Power metal soundtrack by Airborn

Inspired by classics such as: Rogue Squadron, Stardust, Asteroids and Gyruss.

Airborn is a power metal band from Italy, with a 25 years spanning career. The game features an instrumental OST made of classic songs from the band, rerecorded in video games music flavor.
